TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataReceivedEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

summary.span: 提供有关 和 事件的数据。

span.span: Provides data for the and events.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要以异步方式收集的重定向或流输出的过程中，你必须创建处理重定向的流输出事件的方法的。To asynchronously collect the redirected or stream output of a process, you must create a method that handles the redirected stream output events. 进程写入重定向流时调用事件处理程序方法。The event-handler method is called when the process writes to the redirected stream. 事件委托调用事件处理程序的实例与。The event delegate calls your event handler with an instance of . 属性包含进程已写入到重定向流的文本行。The property contains the text line that the process wrote to the redirected stream. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何执行上的重定向的异步读取的操作流`sort`命令。The following code example illustrates how to perform asynchronous read operations on the redirected stream of the `sort` command. `sort`命令是一个控制台应用程序，读取对文本输入进行排序。The `sort` command is a console application that reads and sorts text input. 该示例创建一个事件委托，它为`SortOutputHandler`事件处理程序并将其与关联事件。The example creates an event delegate for the `SortOutputHandler` event handler and associates it with the event. 事件处理程序接收来自的重定向的文本行流，格式文本，并将文本写入屏幕。The event handler receives text lines from the redirected stream, formats the text, and writes the text to the screen. [!code-cpp[Process_AsyncStreams#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/process_asyncstreams/CPP/sort_async.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Process_AsyncStreams#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/process_asyncstreams/CS/sort_async.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Process_AsyncStreams#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/process_asyncstreams/VB/sort_async.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Data As String
public: property System::String ^ Data { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取写入到重定向 输出流的字符行。

span.span: Gets the line of characters that was written to a redirected output stream.

value.span: 由关联的 写入到其重定向 或 流中的行。

span.span: The line that was written by an associated to its redirected or stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当你将重定向或流到事件处理程序，事件每次都会引发该过程将行写入到重定向流。When you redirect the or stream of a to your event handler, an event is raised each time the process writes a line to the redirected stream. 属性是行的已写入到重定向的输出流。The property is the line that the wrote to the redirected output stream. 事件处理程序可以使用属性来筛选进程输出或将输出写入到备用位置。Your event handler can use the property to filter process output or write output to an alternate location. 例如，你可能创建的事件处理程序将所有的错误输出行存储到指定的错误日志文件。For example, you might create an event handler that stores all error output lines into a designated error log file. 行被定义为一系列字符后跟换行符 ("\n") 或一个回车符后面紧跟行换行符 ("\r\n")。A line is defined as a sequence of characters followed by a line feed ("\n") or a carriage return immediately followed by a line feed ("\r\n"). 使用默认系统的 ANSI 代码页，行字符进行编码。The line characters are encoded using the default system ANSI code page. 属性不会不包括终止回车符或换行符。The property does not include the terminating carriage return or line feed. 当重定向的流已关闭时，null 行发送到事件处理程序。When the redirected stream is closed, a null line is sent to the event handler. 确保你的事件处理程序检查适当之前对其进行访问的属性。Ensure your event handler checks the property appropriately before accessing it. 例如，可以使用的静态方法验证事件处理程序中的属性。For example, you can use the static method to validate the property in your event handler. ## Examples 下面的代码示例阐释了简单的事件处理程序与关联事件。The following code example illustrates a simple event handler associated with the event. 事件处理程序接收来自的重定向的文本行流，格式文本，并将文本写入屏幕。The event handler receives text lines from the redirected stream, formats the text, and writes the text to the screen. [!code-cpp[Process_AsyncStreams#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/process_asyncstreams/CPP/datareceivedevent.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[Process_AsyncStreams#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/process_asyncstreams/CS/datareceivedevent.cs#4)] [!code-vb[Process_AsyncStreams#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/process_asyncstreams/VB/datareceivedevent.vb#4)]
